languages.text: "Да ты иди сделай хотя бы глоток! Я в жизни не пробовал воды вкуснее. Говорят, у старика Ромпуса язвы как рукой сняло всего после пары кружек".

traits.locale_text: "Да ты сделай хотя бы глоток! Я в жизни не пробовал воды вкуснее. Говорят, у старика Онарта язвы как рукой сняло всего после пары кружек".

languages.text: "Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."
languages.original_text: "Да ты иди сделай хотя бы глоток! Я в жизни не пробовал воды вкуснее. Говорят, у старика Ромпуса язвы как рукой сняло всего после пары кружек".

traits.locale_text: "Why don't you go and take a sip, just one! I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."
"Why don't you go and take a sip, just one! I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."
"Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."
"Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."
"Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."
"Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."

languages.text: “不如你自己过去喝一口吧？只喝一口就好。我从来没喝过那么甜的水。听说老罗姆帕斯只喝了几口水之后，身上那些水泡就消下去了。”
languages.original_text: "Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."

traits.locale_text: “不如你自己过去喝一口吧？只喝一口就好。我从来没喝过那么甜的水。听说老罗姆帕斯只喝了几口水之后，身上那些水泡就消下去了。”

languages.text: 「そう言うなら、1口飲んでみてくださいよ。あんなに甘い水は、他に飲んだことありません。コップ二杯飲んだだけで、老いぼれたロンパスの水膨れが消えたと言われていますよ」
languages.original_text: "Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."

traits.locale_text: 「そう言うなら、1口飲んでみてくださいよ。あんなに甘い水は、他に飲んだことありません。コップ二杯飲んだだけで、老いぼれたロンパスの水膨れが消えたと言われていますよ」

languages.text: «¿Por qué no le da aunque sea un sorbo? No he probado agua más dulce. Dicen que las ampollas de Rompus desaparecieron después de un par de tazas».
languages.original_text: "Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no le da aunque sea un sorbo? No he probado agua más dulce. Dicen que las ampollas de Rompus desaparecieron después de un par de tazas».

languages.text: "Trinkt doch nur einen klitzekleinen Schluck, nur einen? Ich habe noch nie besseres Wasser gekostet. Die Schwielen vom alten Rompus sollen nach ein paar Tassen verschwunden sein."
languages.original_text: "Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."

traits.locale_text: "Trinkt doch nur einen klitzekleinen Schluck, nur einen? Ich habe noch nie besseres Wasser gekostet. Die Schwielen vom alten Rompus sollen nach ein paar Tassen verschwunden sein."

languages.text: « Vous devriez aller la goûter vous-même. Pour ma part, je n'en avais jamais bu d'aussi douce. Il paraît que toutes les cloques du vieux Rompus ont disparu après seulement quelques gorgées. »
languages.original_text: "Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devriez aller la goûter vous-même. Pour ma part, je n'en avais jamais bu d'aussi douce. Il paraît que toutes les cloques du vieux Rompus ont disparu après seulement quelques gorgées. »

languages.text: "Bir yudum alsana? Bir yudumcuk? Hiç bu kadar lezzetli bir su içmemiştim. İki bardakcık içiveren ihtiyar Rompus'un vücudundaki kabarcıkların tamamen temizlendiğini söylüyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Why don't you go and take a sip, just one? I've never tasted sweeter water. They say old Rompus's blisters went clean away after just a couple of mugs."

traits.locale_text: "Bir yudum alsana? Bir yudumcuk? Hiç bu kadar lezzetli bir su hiç içmemiştim. İki bardakcık içiveren ihtiyar Rompus'un vücudundaki kabarcıkların tamamen temizlendiğini söylüyorlar."
